Question.Subject: how to cut and paste?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
If you want to cut the text ( this means the original text will dissapear, you right click andsay 'cut' or you can highlight the text and on your keyboard press Cntrl X and Cntrl V to paste or you can right click and click paste. Note that you cannot cut text on a website just on a word document etc.
Otherwise to just copy you right click and click copy or highlight the text and on your keyboard press Cntrl V

Answer.Content:
To cut - select what you want to cut and use Ctrl + x To paste click where you want to paste and use Ctrl + V
AJ

If you want to cut the text ( this means the original text will dissapear, you right click andsay 'cut' or you can highlight the text and on your keyboard press Cntrl X and Cntrl V to paste or you can right click and click paste. Note that you cannot cut text on a website just on a word document etc.
Otherwise to just copy you right click and click copy or highlight the text and on your keyboard press Cntrl V
Highlight the material. Go into Edit and hit Cut. Open up Windows Word. Go up into Edit. Hit Paste.
